verses.verse: And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, if <S%H518><s%> you shall listen <S%H8085><s%> diligently to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will set <S%H5414><s%> you on <S%H5921><s%> high <S%H5945><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> blessings <S%H1293><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> you, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> you, if <S%H3588><s%> you shall listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall you be in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall you be in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body, <S%H990><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle, <S%H929><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your cows, <S%H504><s%> and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of your sheep. <S%H6629><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall be your basket <S%H2935><s%> and your store. <S%H4863><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall you be when you come <S%H935><s%> in, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> shall you be when you go <S%H3318><s%> out.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall cause <S%H5414><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> that rise <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> you to be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before your face: they shall come <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H413><s%> you one <S%H259><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> ways. <S%H1870><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall command <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> on you in your storehouses, <S%H618><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> that you set <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to; and he shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall establish <S%H6965><s%> you an holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to himself, as he has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to you, if <S%H3588><s%> you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> in his ways. <S%H1870><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that you are called <S%H7121><s%> by the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and they shall be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of you.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make you plenteous <S%H3498><s%> in goods, <S%H2896><s%> in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body, <S%H990><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle, <S%H929><s%> and in the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall open <S%H6605><s%> to you his good <S%H2896><s%> treasure, <S%H214><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> to your land <S%H776><s%> in his season, <S%H6256><s%> and to bless <S%H1288><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand: <S%H3027><s%> and you shall lend <S%H3867><s%> to many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and you shall not borrow. <S%H3867><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> you the head, <S%H7218><s%> and not the tail; <S%H2180><s%> and you shall be above <S%H4605><s%> only, <S%H7535><s%> and you shall not be beneath; <S%H4295><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> that you listen <S%H8085><s%> to the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> them:

And you shall not go <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> from any <S%H3605><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day, <S%H3117><s%> to the right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> or to the left, <S%H8040><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them.

But it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, if <S%H518><s%> you will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day; <S%H3117><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> you:
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall you be in the city, <S%H5892><s%> and cursed <S%H779><s%> shall you be in the field. <S%H7704><s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be your basket <S%H2935><s%> and your store. <S%H4863><s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall be the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body, <S%H990><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land, <S%H127><s%> the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your cows, <S%H504><s%> and the flocks <S%H6251><s%> of your sheep. <S%H6629><s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> shall you be when you come <S%H935><s%> in, and cursed <S%H779><s%> shall you be when you go <S%H3318><s%> out.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> on you cursing, <S%H3994><s%> vexation, <S%H4103><s%> and rebuke, <S%H4045><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that you set <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to for to do, <S%H6213><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you be destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> and until <S%H5704><s%> you perish <S%H6><s%> quickly; <S%H4118><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the wickedness <S%H7455><s%> of your doings, <S%H4611><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> you have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> stick <S%H1692><s%> to you, until <S%H5704><s%> he have consumed <S%H3615><s%> you from off <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H127><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> you with a consumption, <S%H7829><s%> and with a fever, <S%H6920><s%> and with an inflammation, <S%H1816><s%> and with an extreme <S%H2746><s%> burning, <S%H2746><s%> and with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and with blasting, <S%H7711><s%> and with mildew; <S%H3420><s%> and they shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> you until <S%H5704><s%> you perish. <S%H6><s%>
And your heaven <S%H8064><s%> that is over <S%H5921><s%> your head <S%H7218><s%> shall be brass, <S%H5178><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> that is under <S%H8478><s%> you shall be iron. <S%H1270><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall make <S%H5414><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%> powder <S%H80><s%> and dust: <S%H6083><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> shall it come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on you, until <S%H5704><s%> you be destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall cause <S%H5414><s%> you to be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies: <S%H341><s%> you shall go <S%H3318><s%> out one <S%H259><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> against <S%H413><s%> them, and flee <S%H5127><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> ways <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them: and shall be removed <S%H2189><s%> into all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And your carcass <S%H5038><s%> shall be meat <S%H3978><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the air, <S%H8064><s%> and to the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and no <S%H369><s%> man shall fray <S%H2729><s%> them away.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will smite <S%H5221><s%> you with the botch <S%H7822><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and with the tumors, <S%H6076><s%> and with the scab, <S%H1618><s%> and with the itch, <S%H2775><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> you can <S%H3201><s%> not be healed. <S%H7495><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> you with madness, <S%H7697><s%> and blindness, <S%H5788><s%> and astonishment <S%H8541><s%> of heart: <S%H3824><s%>

And you shall grope <S%H4959><s%> at noonday, <S%H6672><s%> as the blind <S%H5787><s%> gropes <S%H4959><s%> in darkness, <S%H653><s%> and you shall not prosper <S%H6743><s%> in your ways: <S%H1870><s%> and you shall be only <S%H389><s%> oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and spoiled <S%H1497><s%> ever more, <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> and no <S%H369><s%> man shall save <S%H3467><s%> you.

You shall betroth <S%H781><s%> a wife, <S%H802><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7693><s%> with her: you shall build <S%H1129><s%> an house, <S%H1004><s%> and you shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein: you shall plant <S%H5193><s%> a vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> and shall not gather <S%H2490><s%> the grapes thereof.

Your ox <S%H7794><s%> shall be slain <S%H2873><s%> before your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> thereof: your ass <S%H2543><s%> shall be violently <S%H1497><s%> taken <S%H1497><s%> away from before your face, and shall not be restored <S%H7725><s%> to you: your sheep <S%H6629><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and you shall have none <S%H369><s%> to rescue <S%H3467><s%> them.

Your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be given <S%H5414><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and your eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall look, <S%H7200><s%> and fail <S%H3615><s%> with longing for them all <S%H3605><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> long; and there shall be no <S%H369><s%> might <S%H410><s%> in your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land, <S%H127><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your labors, <S%H3018><s%> shall a nation <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> not eat <S%H398><s%> up; and you shall be only <S%H389><s%> oppressed <S%H6231><s%> and crushed <S%H7533><s%> always: <S%H3605><s%>
So that you shall be mad <S%H7696><s%> for the sight <S%H4758><s%> of your eyes <S%H5869><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall see. <S%H7200><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall smite <S%H5221><s%> you in the knees, <S%H1290><s%> and in the legs, <S%H7785><s%> with a sore <S%H7451><s%> botch <S%H7822><s%> that cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> be healed, <S%H7495><s%> from the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> to the top <S%H6936><s%> of your head. <S%H6936><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H3212><s%> you, and your king <S%H4428><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall set <S%H6965><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, to a nation <S%H1471><s%> which neither <S%H3808><s%> you nor your fathers <S%H1><s%> have known; <S%H3045><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> shall you serve <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone. <S%H68><s%>

And you shall become <S%H1961><s%> an astonishment, <S%H8047><s%> a proverb, <S%H4912><s%> and a byword, <S%H8148><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H5971><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lead <S%H5090><s%> you.

You shall carry <S%H3318><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> out into the field, <S%H7704><s%> and shall gather <S%H622><s%> but little <S%H4592><s%> in; for the locust <S%H697><s%> shall consume <S%H2628><s%> it.

You shall plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> and dress <S%H5647><s%> them, but shall neither <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> of the wine, <S%H3196><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> gather <S%H103><s%> the grapes; for the worms <S%H8438><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> them.

You shall have olive <S%H2132><s%> trees throughout all <S%H3605><s%> your coasts, <S%H1366><s%> but you shall not anoint <S%H5480><s%> yourself with the oil; <S%H8081><s%> for your olive <S%H2132><s%> shall cast <S%H5394><s%> his fruit.
You shall beget <S%H3205><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters, <S%H1323><s%> but you shall not enjoy <S%H1961><s%> them; for they shall go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> your trees <S%H6086><s%> and fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%> shall the locust <S%H6767><s%> consume. <S%H3423><s%>

The stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within <S%H7130><s%> you shall get <S%H5927><s%> up above <S%H5921><s%> you very <S%H4605><s%> high; <S%H4605><s%> and you shall come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> very <S%H4295><s%> low. <S%H4295><s%>
He shall lend <S%H3867><s%> to you, and you shall not lend <S%H3867><s%> to him: he shall be the head, <S%H7218><s%> and you shall be the tail. <S%H2180><s%>

Moreover all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H7045><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you, and shall pursue <S%H7291><s%> you, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> you, till <S%H5704><s%> you be destroyed; <S%H8045><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you listened <S%H8085><s%> not to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he commanded <S%H6680><s%> you:
And they shall be on you for a sign <S%H226><s%> and for a wonder, <S%H4159><s%> and on your seed <S%H2233><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>

Because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H834><s%> you served <S%H5647><s%> not the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with joyfulness, <S%H8057><s%> and with gladness <S%H2898><s%> of heart, <S%H3824><s%> for the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> things;

Therefore shall you serve <S%H5647><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> against you, in hunger, <S%H7457><s%> and in thirst, <S%H6772><s%> and in nakedness, <S%H5903><s%> and in want <S%H2640><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> things: and he shall put <S%H5414><s%> a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> on your neck, <S%H6677><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H5375><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you from far, <S%H7350><s%> from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> as swift as the eagle <S%H5404><s%> flies; <S%H1675><s%> a nation <S%H1471><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%> you shall not understand; <S%H8085><s%>

A nation <S%H1471><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> countenance, <S%H6440><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall not regard <S%H5375><s%> the person <S%H6440><s%> of the old, <S%H2205><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> show favor <S%H2603><s%> to the young: <S%H5288><s%>

And he shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle, <S%H929><s%> and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your land, <S%H127><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> you be destroyed: <S%H8045><s%> which <S%H834><s%> also shall not leave <S%H7604><s%> you either corn, <S%H1715><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> or oil, <S%H3323><s%> or the increase <S%H7698><s%> of your cows, <S%H504><s%> or flocks <S%H6251><s%> of your sheep, <S%H6629><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he have destroyed <S%H6><s%> you.

And he shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your gates, <S%H8179><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> your high <S%H1364><s%> and fenced <S%H1219><s%> walls <S%H2346><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> <S%H2004><s%> you trusted, <S%H982><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> your land: <S%H776><s%> and he shall besiege <S%H6887><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your gates <S%H8179><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> your land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you.

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your own body, <S%H990><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons <S%H1121><s%> and of your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you, in the siege, <S%H4692><s%> and in the narrow place, <S%H4689><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> you:

So that the man <S%H376><s%> that is tender <S%H7390><s%> among you, and very <S%H3966><s%> delicate, <S%H6028><s%> his eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be evil <S%H7489><s%> toward his brother, <S%H251><s%> and toward the wife <S%H802><s%> of his bosom, <S%H2436><s%> and toward the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall leave: <S%H3498><s%>

So that he will not give <S%H5414><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of them of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> he shall eat: <S%H398><s%> because he has nothing <S%H3605><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> him in the siege, <S%H4692><s%> and in the narrow place, <S%H4689><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall distress <S%H6693><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> your gates. <S%H8179><s%>
